operations.summary: Set extensions for student quiz submissions
operations.notes: Responses * 200 OK if the request was successful * 403 Forbidden if you are not allowed to extend quizzes for this course

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user we want to add quiz extensions for.

parameters.name: extra_attempts
parameters.description:
Number of times the student is allowed to re-take the quiz over the
multiple-attempt limit. This is limited to 1000 attempts or less.

parameters.name: extra_time
parameters.description:
The number of extra minutes to allow for all attempts. This will
add to the existing time limit on the submission. This is limited to
10080 minutes (1 week)

parameters.name: manually_unlocked
parameters.description:
Allow the student to take the quiz even if it's locked for
everyone else.

parameters.name: extend_from_now
parameters.description:
The number of minutes to extend the quiz from the current time. This is
mutually exclusive to extend_from_end_at. This is limited to 1440
minutes (24 hours)

parameters.name: extend_from_end_at
parameters.description:
The number of minutes to extend the quiz beyond the quiz's current
ending time. This is mutually exclusive to extend_from_now. This is
limited to 1440 minutes (24 hours)

user_id.description: The ID of the Student that needs the quiz extension.

extra_attempts.description: Number of times the student is allowed to re-take the quiz over the multiple-attempt limit.

extra_time.description: Amount of extra time allowed for the quiz submission, in minutes.

manually_unlocked.description: The student can take the quiz even if it's locked for everyone else

end_at.description: The time at which the quiz submission will be overdue, and be flagged as a late submission.
